title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants / The Second Summer of the Sisterhood / Girls in Pants: The Third Summer of the Sisterhood
description: 4 girls, 3 summers, and 1 pair of pants!For the first time ever, all three novels in the #1 New York Times bestselling series are available in this terrific boxed set, which includes an exclusive magnet frame and magnets of the Pants.
author: Ann Brashares
